cause.description:
Street children - are not on the streets by pure choice - you are almost ALWAYS a product of your upbringing! They are children that come from ABUSE, NEGLECT, POVERTY, HUNGER, PARENTS DYING FROM AIDS/OTHER! They are left to survive and the streets are all they have!!
Street children + petty crime + no love + drugs / glue = CRIMINAL!
Come and help changing these childrens hearts ONE AT A TIME!
1. All children have the right to LOVE
2. All children need DISCLIPLINE
3. All children have the right to EDUCATION
4. All children want to be RECOGNISED
5. All children want to be be a part of something SPECIAL
6. All children grow up - some with the wrong love and life
cause.mission: Better the lives of people - one at a time
cause.name: ONE AT A TIME
